status.royal: is part of the royal family

status.cleric: is a high cleric of the main religion of the region

status.merchant: is a successful and powerful merchant

status.preacher: is a powerful revolutionary preacher among the populous

status.cLeader: is secretly a powerful Cult Leader that operates in the shadows

status.beggar: is a drunk beggar in need for a change

status.necromancer: is a powerful Necromancer with a thirst for world domination

status.warlord: is a powerful warlord with a thirst for world domination

status.demon: is secretly a powerful demon with an evil agenda

status.devil: is secretly a powerful devil with an evil agenda

status.god: is an evil god with an evil agenda

motivations.murder: has commited a murder that wants to keep secret

motivations.madness: is gone completely insane, and madness pushes to the wrong path

motivations.affliction: is afflicted with a secret maladie that is consuming

plotTwists.tooLate: regardless, in the end it was is too late

plotTwists.ruse: regardless, in the end it was is too late

plotTwists.hero: the villain is in reality, the hero

plotTwists.ruse: in the end it was all a ruse

plotTwists.game: in the end it was all a game

deities.angry: there is an angry deity that is showing its discontent

deities.disappointed: a deity is disappointed in its believers and they are now striving to gain back its favor

deities.greedy: a deity has greedy goals and is meddling in the world to obtain what it wants

deities.afflicted: a deity has contracted a rare affliction

deities.competitive: there is a feud between two gods and it shows signs in the world

deities.defeated: a deity has defeated and deposed another

timeframe.war: the story happens during times of war

timeframe.peace: the story happens during times of peace and prosperity

timeframe.merging: the story happens during the merging of two noble houses

timeframe.religious: the story happens during religious unrest

timeframe.cultural: the story happens during cultural unrest
